abstract: Ohio Senate passes bill that would ban abortions after 20 weeks of gestation, following Wisconsin Senate's passage of similar ban; bill will proceed to House, which like Senate is dominated by Republicans.
lead_paragraph: The Ohio Senate passed a bill Wednesday that would ban abortions after 20 weeks of gestation, following the passage of a similar ban by the Wisconsin Senate this month.
snippet: The Ohio Senate passed a bill Wednesday that would ban abortions after 20 weeks of gestation, following the passage of a similar ban by the Wisconsin Senate this month.
